# Template Contribution

## Description
Briefly describe the template you are adding. What does it build? What technologies does it use?

## Checklist
- [ ] I have added my template to `data/templates.json`.
- [ ] I have used a unique `id` (incremented from the previous highest).
- [ ] I have validated that the JSON is syntax-error free.
- [ ] My prompt follows the "Vibe Coding" structure (System Role, Objective, Critical Instructions).
- [ ] I have added appropriate tags (including Difficulty Level).

## Screenshot (Optional)
If you tested this prompt, attach a screenshot of the result here.
